question: Last month you had an overseas holiday with a friend from your college. They have just sent you some holiday photos together. In your letter:thank them for the holiday and the photosExplain why you didn't write earlier.invite them to come and stay with you
text: It's been like yesterday after I saw the photos that you sent to me. It was a precious moment that I got a chance to relieve away from the monotony of life. It was very generous of you that you could invite and allow me to stay over at your flat.

I feel bad recently because I was lost in touch with you after that trip. Let me justify about that, and don't get me wrong that I took advantage of you for the visit. I knew the incident of my sister's car accident after I had arrived back. I was dreadful about my sister and running between hospital and home. However, she gets back in a good form now.

I was wondering if you could visit back to me in next holiday. I am always welcoming to show you all around my country. I would also invite your parents too if they could spare some time to do it. I look forward to hearing positive replies from you.
